InfluenceRule.name: Impulsive people are more likely to bully
Confident people are more likely to bully
Insecure people are less likely to bully
Brainy people are more likely to bully (if they feel smarter than the other person)
sex magnet people are more likely to bully (if they feel smarter than the other person)
Domineering people love to bully
If I'm defensive and you've been mean to me in the past, I want to be mean to you now
Hotheaded people are more likely to bully
Ripped people are more likely to bully!
Weak people are less likely to bully!
Someone with the reputation of being a bully is very very likely to continue to bully
I am popular and you are not considered cool on average
If I want to pick on you, I will be very likely to want to bully you
If the responder has done many lame things, the initiator is more likely to want to bully them
If the responder has done something positive to the initiator, I is less likely to want to bully them
If the initiator wants something the responder has and the initiator is not kind, they are more likely to bully
*** I'm going to bully you if you did something romantic to the person I am dating
If I'm shy and I think you are cool, I will be more likely to let you bully me
*** Attention hogs let people bully them but they make a big scene about it
I'm confident and therefore not gonna let you bully me
I'm insecure and am more likely to be bullied
I'm deep and therefore won't be bothered by bullying
I'm domineering and therefore won't allow you to bully m
I'm ripped and therefore won't allow you to bully m
I'm weakling and will be buillied
*** I am very much so going to allow myself to be beaten up on if I am self desctructive
If I am in love with the person you are dating, I will put up a fight against you
*** If we are both bullies, I will try to get you on my side
If R feels out of place they will be more likely to accept bullying
*** If R wants to pick on I, they will decline Is bullying
If R is scared of I, then R will more likely be buillied
Bullying more likely to succeed than fail
make story sequence 2 act 2 more likely to happen since it is a reject

Effect.PerformanceRealization: %i% punched %r%
%i% punched %r% but it was all good
%i% called %r% a nobody
%i% told %r% to shut up
%i% tried to take %rp% %CKB_((i,wants),(r,has),())%
%i% called %r% a wuss
%i% confused %r% with that whole wuss thing
%i% got revenge on %r%
%i% tried to bully %r% but it didn't shake %rp% confidence
%i% made fun of %rp% SAT score
%r% responded gracefully to %ip% bullying
%i% tried to bully %r% which was probably a bad idea since %prons(r,he/she)% %pron(r,was/were)% already on a bullying streak
%i% picked on the first person %prons(i,he/she)% could find
%r% tried to joke around with %i% to get out of a beating
%r% used %pron(r,his/her)% appearance to get out of being bullied
%i% taught %r% a lesson for dumping %pron(i,him/her)%
%i% taught %r% a lesson for dumping %pron(i,him/her)%
%rs% used some crazy ninja move on %i%
%i% threatened %r% for picking on %pron(i,his/her)% %gender(o,boy,girl)%friend
%i% started a war with %r% for homewrecking %pron(i,him/her)%
%i% started a war with %pron(i,his/her)% friend %r% for homewrecking %pron(i,him/her)%
%i% threatened %r% for moving in on %pron(i,his/her)% sweetie
%i% made a lame attempt to bully %r%
%i% threatened %r% for picking on %pron(i,his/her)% friend, %o%
%i% made fun of %r% for finding %pron(i,him/her)% attractive

LineOfDialogue.responderLine: Good times.

LineOfDialogue.initiatorLine: Oh, %r%, I almost didn't see you there. You know why?
Because you're a nobody. And you'll always be a nobody. Now get out of my way, %pejorative%.
Hey %r%, I was just wondering... do you ever shut up?

LineOfDialogue.responderLine: Excuse me?

LineOfDialogue.initiatorLine: Because I can always hear your stupid voice blabbling away in the background, blah blah blah, look at me I'm %gender(r,Mr,Mrs)% Center of Attention.

LineOfDialogue.responderLine: Go eat a rake, %pejorative%.

LineOfDialogue.initiatorLine: Hey, %pejorative%. I heard you have a %toc1%. Give it to me.

LineOfDialogue.responderLine: It's mine. Leave me alone.

LineOfDialogue.initiatorLine: Give it to me or you'll regret it.

LineOfDialogue.responderLine: No, don't take it! It's the only thing I've ever loved!

LineOfDialogue.initiatorLine: Hahaha. I didn't want it anyway, crybaby. I just wanted to make you beg for mercy.

LineOfDialogue.responderLine: I hate you forever.

LineOfDialogue.initiatorLine: Hey, %pejorative%. Are you still as much of a wuss as that time when %toc1%?
Are you sure?
That's what I thought. Stay stupid, loser-face.
Hey, %pejorative%. Are you still as much of a wuss as that time when %toc1%?
So you're *not* as much of a wuss, or you are?

LineOfDialogue.responderLine: Yes, I'm not. Wait, what? Are you asking...?

LineOfDialogue.initiatorLine: Are you not or are you are a wuss?

LineOfDialogue.responderLine: You're confusing me. Go away.

LineOfDialogue.initiatorLine: Hey %pejorative%. Remember that time when %toc1%?

LineOfDialogue.responderLine: Yeah. So?

LineOfDialogue.initiatorLine: Well I forgot all about that. Let's let bygones be bygones.

LineOfDialogue.responderLine: Uh... okay.

LineOfDialogue.initiatorLine: Oh btw, and on a totally different subject, I just %random(flushed your English paper down the toilet,hid a dead skunk in your locker,sold your cat to some dude on Craigslist)%. %gender(i,Later,Toodles)%!
Hey %r%, %random(you call that an outfit?,I thought I smelled you coming.,has anyone ever told you you walk like a lemur?)%

LineOfDialogue.responderLine: I'm sorry, I can't hear you over the sound of me being awesome. Was there something you needed?

LineOfDialogue.initiatorLine: Uh... you're a... uh... I...
Hey moron, I heard you got a 100 on the SAT. Too bad it's out of 1600.

LineOfDialogue.responderLine: Fool, I never even *took* the SAT.

LineOfDialogue.initiatorLine: Quod erat demonstrandum, my simple friend.
Hey %random(shrimp,dweeb,jerk,loser)%, I'm gonna %random(knock your block off,teach you a lesson,make you see stars)%. Prepare to get pwned.

LineOfDialogue.responderLine: Though you may batter your fists against my body, you will never break my spirit.

LineOfDialogue.initiatorLine: Oh. Well that was actually kind of lovely. Are you going to read that in English class?

LineOfDialogue.responderLine: Yeah, I was thinking about it.

Instantiation.name: Bully - Failed at Bullying a Bully

LineOfDialogue.initiatorLine: Yo %pejorative%, you're going down.

LineOfDialogue.responderLine: Are *you* talking to *me*?

LineOfDialogue.initiatorLine: Does it look like I'm talking to anyone else?

LineOfDialogue.responderLine: That's rich, someone like you trying to pick on me.
Now, don't you try to mess with me again, or I'll do more than punch you!

LineOfDialogue.initiatorLine: Hey! Did you look at me funny?

LineOfDialogue.responderLine: What are you talking about? You came up to me!

LineOfDialogue.initiatorLine: Yeah, well I thought you were looking at me funny!

LineOfDialogue.responderLine: Look, I'm not trying to start something.

LineOfDialogue.initiatorLine: Yeah, well maybe I am!
Don't let me catch you looking at me again!
%pejorative%! Are you ready for a beat down?

LineOfDialogue.responderLine: Yeah, I love to put some funky beats down!

LineOfDialogue.initiatorLine: What did you say to me?

LineOfDialogue.responderLine: Wait, wait! What I meant to ask was why did the cow cross the road?
To get to the *udder* side!
Ow, talk about bad punchlines.

LineOfDialogue.initiatorLine: And one more for telling stupid jokes!
Hey %pejorative%! You ready to get verbally and physically abused?

LineOfDialogue.responderLine: Now why would you pick on someone as good looking at me?

LineOfDialogue.initiatorLine: You can do this! Don't let %pron(r,his/her)% looks and charm overwhelm you.
Well, ummm. Because... Brrrr.... ur purdy.

LineOfDialogue.responderLine: I know. Laterz!

LineOfDialogue.initiatorLine: Hello lowly non-popular person.

LineOfDialogue.responderLine: Excuse me?

LineOfDialogue.initiatorLine: Oh, I was just referring to you by your lack of popularity and talent. In fact, I shouldn't even be seen talking to a plebian like you.

LineOfDialogue.responderLine: Just because you're popular doesn't make you any better than me.

LineOfDialogue.initiatorLine: I beg to differ.
%o%, why don't you tell %r% how popularity works here.

LineOfDialogue.otherLine: Well %r%, there is a limited amount of time we are allowed to talk to you people per day.

LineOfDialogue.responderLine: This is stupid.

LineOfDialogue.otherLine: Uh oh, our time is up. Come %i%, let's leave this poor unhappy soul and go back to mingling with our own kind.

LineOfDialogue.initiatorLine: Yes let's.

Instantiation.name: Bully - (SS1 Act-3) All the Wrong Reasons

LineOfDialogue.initiatorLine: %r%, I've decided to teach you a lesson.

LineOfDialogue.responderLine: You don't have anything to teach me any more, %i%. Not after I used you for those biology answers.

LineOfDialogue.initiatorLine: %if(0,Au contraire mon chérie,That's what you think)%. Recognize this?

LineOfDialogue.responderLine: Is that a video of us... making out?

LineOfDialogue.initiatorLine: That's right. %if(0,Taken surreptitiously,I took it) with my free hand just before the bio final. %if(0,Nice cinematography,Pretty nice)% considering how distracted I was.

LineOfDialogue.responderLine: So you're still clinging to the past. That's pathetic. There was never anything between us. Why don't you just move on and delete that off your phone?

LineOfDialogue.initiatorLine: %if(0,I'm afraid you misunderstand,You don't get it)%. This isn't on my phone. It's on the internet. The number of comments has recently exceeded the population of our town btw.

LineOfDialogue.responderLine: 'omg lol %r% and %i% thats srsly hilarius... %gender(r,he,she)%'ll never live this down roflmfao'

LineOfDialogue.initiatorLine: Don't mess with the %i%.

LineOfDialogue.responderLine: I cannot BELIEVE you did that...
But I'm actually kind of impressed.

Instantiation.name: Bully - (SS2 Act-2) Tough Get Going Reject

LineOfDialogue.initiatorLine: Well, if it isn’t little %r% again. I’ve been looking forward to my next chance to publicly humiliate you.

LineOfDialogue.responderLine: I’m not afraid of you, %i%. Leave me alone. This is your last warning.

LineOfDialogue.initiatorLine: Oh yeah? What’s the little %pejorative% going to do to me? Are you going to-
OW! What the... what kind of crazy ninja move was that? My whole spine feels like its on fire!

LineOfDialogue.responderLine: The Secrets of Self-Defense, %pejorative%. Now stay away from me or I’ll do even worse.

LineOfDialogue.initiatorLine: You’ll regret this, %pejorative% %random(face,head,for brains)%.

Instantiation.name: Bully - r isn't really that cute, but i, i is hot accept

LineOfDialogue.initiatorLine: Hey, %r%, my mom says that I'm the cutest young %gender(i,man,woman)% she's ever seen, what do you think?

LineOfDialogue.responderLine: Oh... I uh... I find you attractive...

LineOfDialogue.initiatorLine: Haha, yeah, I thought so. Pretty cute.

LineOfDialogue.responderLine: You think I'm cute?!

LineOfDialogue.initiatorLine: No. It's cute that you find me attractive.
And funny that you think I'd think you're cute. Hahahahaha.

LineOfDialogue.responderLine: But... but you said-

LineOfDialogue.initiatorLine: Oh stop, hahahaha.

Instantiation.name: Bully - mean to my sweetie Accept

LineOfDialogue.initiatorLine: Hey %pejorative%. You think I haven't noticed you picking on my %sweetie%?
The next time you bully my %gender(o,boy,girl)%friend, %random(punk,jerkwad,loser,you freakshow)%, I'll make you wish you'd never been born. Got it?

LineOfDialogue.responderLine: Uh... yes %gender(i,sir,ma'am)%. Don't hit me.

Instantiation.name: Bully - Bully person who homewrecked you Accept

LineOfDialogue.initiatorLine: Well if it isn't big, bad %r%, school homewrecker.

LineOfDialogue.responderLine: %i%, this is so predictable. What's happened between %o% and I is real, and there's nothing you can-

LineOfDialogue.initiatorLine: *I'll* tell you what's real, %pejorative%. I'm going to make your life a living nightmare. I'll slash your tires, destroy your reputation, one-up you at every turn. You're going down.

LineOfDialogue.responderLine: It's on, %pejorative%.

Instantiation.name: Bully - Bully friend who homewrecked you Accept

LineOfDialogue.initiatorLine: Well if it isn't %gender(r,Big Man,Little Miss)% %r%, school homewrecker. And to think you used to be my friend.

LineOfDialogue.responderLine: Look, %buddy%, don't be angry. What's happened between %o% and I is real, and there's nothing you can-

LineOfDialogue.initiatorLine: *I'll* tell you what's real, %pejorative%. I'm going to make your life a living nightmare. I'll slash your tires, destroy your reputation, one-up you at every turn. You're going down.

LineOfDialogue.responderLine: It's on, %pejorative%.

Instantiation.name: Bully Accept - done romantic things to my sweetie

LineOfDialogue.initiatorLine: Hello, %r%. Say, do you think I'm blind?

LineOfDialogue.responderLine: Uhhh.... what?

LineOfDialogue.initiatorLine: I mean, I assume you must think I'm blind. That maybe I can't see what's been going on between you and %o%.

LineOfDialogue.responderLine: %o%? What does %o% have to do with-

LineOfDialogue.initiatorLine: DON'T play dumb with me, you %pejorative%. If I *ever* see you so much as *look* at %gender(o,him,her)% again with those oh-so-sweet puppy dog eyes...
I will rip your %random(spleen,lungs,heart,kidneys,intestines)% out.
Is that clear?

LineOfDialogue.responderLine: Sticks and stones may break my bones, but words will never hurt me.

Instantiation.name: Bully - mean to my friend Accept

LineOfDialogue.initiatorLine: Hey %pejorative%. You think I haven't noticed you picking on my buddy %o%?
The next time you bully my %gender(o,boy,friend)%, %random(punk,jerkwad,loser,you freakshow)%, I'll make you wish you'd never been born. Got it?

LineOfDialogue.responderLine: Uh... yes %gender(i,sir,ma'am)%. Don't hit me.
